card.name: Fluttershy
card.text: Reach Whenever a Critter enters the battlefield under your control or you gain control of a Critter, put a +1/+1 counter on Fluttershy. {T}: Put a 0/1 green Critter creature token onto the battlefield. {1BB}: Transform Fluttershy unless a player who controls a Critter has you choose and gain control of a Critter he or she controls.

card.name: Fluttershy Scorned
card.text: Trample, reach At end of combat, if a creature dealt damage by Fluttershy Scorned this turn died, transform Fluttershy Scorned.

card.name: Pinkie Pie
card.text: Whenever I block or become blocked, or the target of a spell or ability, put a colorless snack token onto the battlefield and flip three coins! I also have haste and persist as long as you're singing... Win 0 flips -- Oh no! Remove all +1/+1 counters from me and transform me! Win 1 flip -- Look at the top three cards of target player's library. Win 2 flips -- You may move all counters on me onto another creature, then exile me. If you do, you may return me to the battlefield at any time you could cast an instant. (You're not casting me, so it's free!) Win 3 flips -- Proliferate, then move a counter from any number of creatures to any number of other creatures, then proliferate again! Whee!

card.name: Pinkie Pie Forsaken
card.text: Whenever a player completes a sentence in his or her normal voice, any other player may say 'A-ha!'s If a player does, the caught player discards a card. Then that player loses 1 life for each card in his or her graveyard unless he or she comments on how those cards betrayed and abandoned their owner. At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has six or more cards in his or her hand, transform Pinkie Pie Forsaken.

card.name: Twilight Sparkle
card.text: When Twilight Sparkle enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each legendary creature you and your teammates control. At the beginning of each end step, if a counter was placed on a creature you or a teammate control this turn, draw a card. If not, you may pay {B}. If you do, transform Twilight Sparkle.

card.name: Twilight Sparkle Unhinged
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature. If that creature dies this way, transform Twilight Sparkle Unhinged.

card.name: Applejack
card.text: Vigilance, persist When Applejack enters the battlefield, put three colorless snack tokens onto the battlefield. {T}, Sacrifice a snack: Put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you and your teammates control.

card.name: Rainbow Dash
card.text: Flying, first strike, haste Rainbow Dash has double strike as long as you control three or more Fans. Whenever you cast a Fan spell, you may pay {G/W}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Rainbow Dash.

card.name: Rarity
card.text: Glamor Rarity can't be blocked by creatures without glamor. Whenever Rarity becomes tapped, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an Attire card. Put that card into your hand and the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: The Queen of the Changelings
card.text: When The Queen of the Changelings enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature or nontoken planeswalker. If you do, The Queen of the Changelings becomes a copy of the exiled card, except she gains 'When this permanent leaves the battlefield, return it to the battlefield transformed, then return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.'

card.name: Chrysalis Unmasked
card.text: Whenever a +1/+1 counter is removed from a creature on the battlefield, put a loyalty counter on Chrysalis Unmasked. (Moving removes counters.) +1: Move a counter from target permanent onto another target permanent. -3: Remove all counters from target creature. Gain control of that creature for as long as you control Chrysalis Unmasked. -10: Put ten 2/2 black and blue Shapeshifter creature tokens with flying and changeling named Changeling Invader onto the battlefield.

card.name: Nightmare Moon
card.text: If Nightmare Moon would leave the battlefield while she still has loyalty counters on her, you may transform her instead. +1: Target player sacrifices a nonblack, nontoken permanent. All permanents it shared a card type with become black. 0: Gain control of target black permanent until the end of your next turn. It becomes colorless. -7: Gain control of all black permanents.

card.name: Princess Luna
card.text: Whenever you a +1/+1 counter on a creature or sacrifice a snack, you may put a loyalty counter on Princess Luna. 0: Tap or untap all black permanents target player controls. -2: Put a 1/1 colorless Pony Foal creature token onto the battlefield for each black permanent target player controls.

card.name: Spike
card.text: When an artifact enters the battlefield for the third time in a turn, transform Spike. {T}: Exile target artifact, enchantment or snack you control, then return it to the battlefield under target player's control.

card.name: Spike Insatiable
card.text: Spike Insatiable attacks each turn if able. Whenever Spike Insatiable attacks, each player exiles an artifact, enchantment or snack he or she controls. If a player can't, return the cards exiled that way to the battlefield under your control at end of combat. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player controls no artifacts, enchantments and/or snacks, transform Spike Insatiable.

card.name: Ursa Minor
card.text: When Ursa Minor dies, if a source an opponent controls targeted or damaged Ursa Minor this turn, return it to the battlefield transformed under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Ursa Major
card.text: Annihilator 3 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices three permanents.) Ursa Major attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Derpy Hooves // Ditzy Doo
card.text:
Flying
When Derpy Hooves enters the battlefield, target player puts a 1/1 colorless Pony Foal creature token onto the battlefield.
{1GW}: Exile target artifact. That artifact's controller puts a colorless snack token onto the battlefield. --- Flying
When Ditzy Doo enters the battlefield, target player puts two colorless snack tokens onto the battlefield.
{1RR}: Ditzy Doo deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: The Elements of Harmony
card.text:
The Elements of Harmony cost 1 less to cast for each +1/+1 counter on creatures you control.
The Elements of Harmony are indestructible.
Tap six untapped creatures you control: Exile target permanent.

card.name: Princess Celestia
card.text: Whenever a nonland permanent you or your teammates control becomes tapped for the first time in a turn, you may untap it. +2: Tap target permanent. Its controller discards a card at random then draws a card. -4: Tap all creatures, then tap them again at the beginning of their controller's next upkeep. -6: Exile all tapped non-land permanents.

card.name: Discord
card.text: Whenever a creature attacks Discord, put a -1/-1 counter on it. +1: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. 0: Target opponent discards a card. If he or she can't, Discord deals 3 damage to that player. -5: Each creature with a -1/-1 counter on it fights another target creature.

card.name: Princess Cadance
card.text: +1: Put +1/+1 counter on target creature. +1: Put a 1/1 colorless Pony Foal creature token onto the battlefield. -9: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on any number of target creatures.

card.name: Shining Armor
card.text: Shining Armor enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on him. If a source would deal damage to you, a teammate, or a permanent you or your teammates control, for each +1/+1 counter on Shining Armor, prevent 1 damage that source would deal to that permanent or player.

card.name: Cerberus
card.text: Vigilance Cerberus can block up to two additional creatures. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, put target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You may cast Cerberus from your graveyard.

card.name: Mare Do Well
card.type: Legendary Creature - Unicorn Pegasus Earth Pony
card.text:
Flash, flying, vigilance, hexproof, haste
Champion a legendary Pony When Mare Do Well enters the battlefield, you may tap or untap up to four other target artifacts and/or creatures. 4: Return Mare Do Well to her owner's hand.

card.name: Friendship Is Magic
card.text: When Friendship is Magic enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to six target creatures. Each legendary creature you or your teammates control with a +1/+1 counter on it is indestructible.

card.name: The Sun
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Whenever you tap The Sun for mana, untap all nonland permanents your opponents control. {6}, {T}, Sacrifice The Sun: Untap all nonland permanents you and your teammates control.

card.name: The Moon
card.text: {T}: choose a mana color that is in your or in a teammates mana pool. Add one mana of that color to your mana pool. {6}, {T}, Sacrifice The Moon: Until end of turn, if a card would be put into its owner's graveyard, hand, or library, exile it instead. Cards can't leave exile this turn.

card.name: The Rainbow Factory
card.text: Whenever fortified land becomes tapped, sacrifice a permanent. If you do, add one mana of each of the sacrificed permanent's colors to your mana pool, then target player loses 1 life for each mana produced this way. Fortify {2/B}{2/B}

card.name: Sonic Rainboom
card.text: Rainbow Dash Feat -- If you control a creature with the words 'Rainbow Dash's in its name, you may pay {1}{B}{R} rather than pay Sonic Rainboom's mana cost. Search your library for up to five Fan and/or legendary creature cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Chief Thunderhooves
card.text: First strike, vigilance, provoke, haste When Chief Thunderhooves enters the battlefield, Buffalo creatures you and your teammates control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn. GGG, Sacrifice a snack: Return Chief Thunderhooves from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: The Cutie Mark Crusaders
card.text: Trample, haste Whenever a counter is put on The Cutie Mark Crusaders, they gain all abilities of target non-Foal creature until end of turn. At the beginning of each end step, move all counters from The Cutie Mark Crusaders onto one or more other target creatures.

card.name: The Incredible Iron Will
card.text:
First strike, trample, wither
Whenever The Incredible Iron Will deals combat damage to a player, distribute that many +1/+1 counters among any number of other target creatures.
{T}: Other creatures you and your teammates control gain first strike, trample and wither until end of turn.

card.name: Taken By The Swarm
card.text: Put a 1/1 black and green Parasprite Critter token with flying onto the battlefield for each counter on target permanent. Exile that permanent

card.name: Top Dogs
card.text: Sacrifice a land: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. {B}{B}: Each player sacrifices a creature. {R}{R}: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws that many cards. {G}{G}: Each player puts a permanent card from his or her graveyard onto the battlefield.

card.name: Twists And Turns
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Sacrifice Twists and Turns: Gain control of each creature with a -1/-1 counter on it for as long as it has a -1/-1 counter on it.

card.name: Post Ponies!
card.text:
When Post Ponies! enters the battlefield, if it's not a token, each of your teammates puts a token that's a copy of Post Ponies! onto the battlefield.
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a legendary permanent and/or a planeswalker at random, then put a token that's a copy of that permanent onto the battlefield. It's a Fan Art artifact in addition to its other types.
The 'legend rule' and the 'planeswalker uniqueness rule' don't apply.

card.name: Hoity-Toity
card.text: Vigilance, Glamor Other creatures with glamor you control get +1/+1. {T}: Target creature without glamor gets -2/-0 and loses all abilities until end of turn.

card.name: Ponyville Construction Crew
card.text: When Ponyville Construction Crew enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put that card on top of it. Whenever Ponyville Construction Crew becomes tapped, you may attach target Fortification you control to target land you control.

card.name: Twist
card.text: {T}: Put a colorless snack token onto the battlefield.

card.name: However Pinkie Pie Does It
card.text:
Pinkie Pie Feat -- If you control a creature with the words 'Pinkie Pie' in its name, you may pay {1}{R}{R} rather than pay However Pinkie Pie Does It's mana cost.
Roll a six-sided die. Exile that number of target permanents, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control. If creatures you own would enter the battlefield this way during your declare blockers step, you may have any number of those creatures enter the battlefield blocking an attacking creature instead. (They can block creatures they couldn't block normally.)

card.name: Selfish Desire
card.text: Flash When Selfish Desire enters the battlefield, you may change the target of target spell or ability to Selfish Desire. Whenever a source deals damage to Selfish Desire, that source's controller loses that much life and gains control of Selfish Desire.

card.name: Windigo Herd
card.text: Flying Windigo Herd's power and toughness are each equal to the number of -1/-1 counters on other creatures on the battlefield. {1}{U}{B}: Tap target creature with a -1/-1 counter on it and put another -1/-1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Gummy
card.text: Provoke Gummy is indestructible.

card.name: Pound Cake And Pumpkin Cake
card.text: Reach, Haste Pound Cake and Pumpkin Cake have protection from their own colors. {T}: Pound Cake and Pumpkin Cake deal 1 damage to each creature that shares a color with them. {U}: Exchange the colors of two target creatures until end of turn.

card.name: Lighten the Burden
card.text: When Lighten the Burden enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of two target creatures. Whenever a +1/+1 counter is placed on a creature you or your teammates control, you may remove a counter from another target creature.

card.name: Prince Blueblood
card.text: All damage that would be dealt to a player by other creatures is dealt to Prince Blueblood instead. Whenever Prince Blueblood is dealt damage, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Meany-Pants's Counsel
card.text: When Meany-Pants' Counsel enters the battlefield put a -1/-1 counter on each of two target creatures. Creatures your opponents control with counters on them block each turn if able.

card.name: Opalescence
card.text: Flash, Wither, Haste Sacrifice another Critter: Regenerate Opalescence {T}: Opalescence fights another creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other) {3}: Opalescence fights another target creature. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Cheerilee
card.text: Whenever you draw a card outside of your draw step, you may pay {G}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target Foal. Whenever you place a +1/+1 counter on a Foal, you may pay {U}{U}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Super-Natural Succor
card.text: When Super Natural Succor enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of two target creatures. Each creature you or your teammates control with a counter on it has hexproof. Whenever a +1/+1 counter is placed on a creature, you may regenerate it.

card.name: Tank
card.text: Whenever Tank attacks or blocks, each player proliferates. Tank doesn't untap during your next untap step. Tank has flying and vigilance as long as he has a +1/+1 counter on him and is indestructible as long as he has a -1/-1 counter on him. Persist

card.name: Vanquish the Ursa
card.text: Twilight Sparkle Feat -- If you control a creature with the words 'Twilight Sparkle' in its name, you may pay {1}{W}{U} rather than pay Vanquish the Ursa's mana cost. The owner of target creature shuffles it into his or her library, then draws a card. If that creature’s power is 5 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on each Pony creature you and your teammates control.

card.name: The Serpent Of Everfree Forest
card.text: Glamor, islandwalk Whenever The Serpent of Everfree Forest is dealt damage, tap him. He doesn't untap during your next untap step. Whenever a +1/+1 counter is placed on The Serpent of Everfree Forest, untap him.

card.name: The Wonderbolts
card.text: When you cast The Wonderbolt, put X tokens that are a copy of The Wonderbolts onto the battlefield. Flying, Haste {2}{G}{U}: Target player puts a token that is a copy of The Wonderbolts onto the battlefield.

card.name: It Was Under 'E'!
card.text: When It Was Under 'E'! enters the battlefield, proliferate, then move a counter from target creature onto another target creature. Each creature you and your teammates control with a counter on it has '{T}: Target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. If that card is an instant or sorcery card, you may have that player put it into his or her hand instead.'

card.name: Race To The Finish
card.text: When Race to the Finish enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and a -1/-1 counter on another target creature. Each creature you or your teammates control with a counter on it has double strike.

card.name: Bog Hydra
card.text: Bog Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever a Pony leaves the battlefield, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Bog Hydra. {G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Bog Hydra: Bog Hydra gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof and trample until end of turn.

card.name: The Truth Not Always Be Pleasant
card.text: Applejack Feat -- If you control a creature with the word 'Applejack' in its name, you may pay {1}{G}{W} rather than pay The Truth Not Always Be Pleasant's mana cost. Target player draws a card for each creature with a +1/+1 counter on it on the battlefield, then discards a card for each creature with a -1/-1 counter on it on the battlefield.

card.name: Renounce The Friendless
card.text: Destroy each creature without a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Hush Now // Quiet Now
card.text: Tap each artifact and creature with an activated or triggered ability your opponents control. --- Untap each artifact and creature with an activated or triggered ability you and your teammates control. Those permanents gain hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: A Magical Place // With So Many Wonders
card.text: Put cards from the top of your library into your graveyard until you put a land card into your graveyard this way. Then return target land card or target Critter creature from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. --- Exile the top six cards of your library face-down. Target opponent looks at these cards and separates them into three piles of one, two and three cards. Put one pile into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Winter // Wrap Up
card.text: Tap each artifact, creature and land that isn't enchanted, equipped or fortified. --- Until end of turn, creatures you and your teammates control have '{T}: Exile target permanent. Its controller exiles the top card of his or her library, then puts it onto the battlefield if it's a permanent card.'

card.name: Giggle At // The Ghostly
card.text: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. That creature attacks this turn if able --- Target creature’s power becomes equal to its toughness until end of turn. It can’t block or be blocked until end of turn.

card.name: Thread By Thread // Stitching It Together
card.text: Put an Attire card from your hand onto the battlefield, then attach any number of Attires you control to any number of target creatures you control. --- Sacrifice any number of permanents, then return an artifact or enchantment from any graveyard to the battlefield under your control for each permanent sacrificed this way.

card.name: Critter Stampede
card.text: Critter Stampede deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player, where X is the number of Critter creatures on the battlefield.

card.name: Philomena

card.name: Philomena Reborn
card.text: Flying When Philomena Reborn dies, return her from her owner's graveyard to her owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Reclusive Gemhoarder

card.name: Froggy Bottom Bog

card.name: Stampeding Grounds

card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever Owlowiscious attacks or blocks, you may draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Share the Pain
card.text: When Share the Pain enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and a -1/-1 counter on another target creature. Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a counter on it is dealt damage for the first time in a turn, its controller has it deal damage equal to its power to another creature he or she controls.

card.name: Screwball
card.text: Fyling Wehn Scrawbell etners the bittlefeald, tagert pylear discrads a crad at rodnam.

card.name: Crush The Common Foe
card.text: When Crush the Common Foe enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of two target creatures. Each creature you or your teammates control with a counter on it has provoke.

card.name: That Fandom Is Fast
card.text: Whenever a player casts a Pony spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a 0/2 colorless Pony Fan Art artifact creature token onto the battlefield. Sacrifice an Art: Target creature gains first strike and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Big Macintosh
card.text: Vigilance, persist {T}: Remove a -1/-1 counter from another target creature and untap it.

card.name: Care For Big And Small
card.text: When Care for Big and Small enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of two target creatures. Whenever a creature you or your teammates control with a counter on it attacks, its controller puts a 1/1 colorless Pony Foal and a 0/1 green Critter token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Cherry Jubilee
card.text: Snack spells you and your teammates cast cost {1} less to cast. Activated abilities of snacks you and your teammates control cost {1} less to activate.

card.name: Tender Loving Care
card.text: Fluttershy Feat — If you control a creature with the word 'Fluttershy' in its name, you may pay {1}{G}{G} rather than pay Tender Loving Care's mana cost. Critter creatures you and your teammates control get +1/+1. Creature tokens you and your teammates control control get +1/+1.

card.name: Winona
card.text: Vigilance, protection from Critters Whenever Winona blocks or becomes blocked, put a 0/1 green Critter creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Filthy Rich
card.text: Whenever another creature with a counter on it leaves the battlefield, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Filthy Rich. When Filthy Rich leaves the battlefield, you may move all counters from Filthy Rich onto any number of target creatures.

card.name: Angel
card.text: Intimidate, protection from Ponies. Whenever Angel deals combat damage to a player, you may remove a +1/+1 counter from target creature that player controls.

card.name: Whatever It Is Pinkie Pie Does
card.text: Pinkie Pie Feat -- If you control a creature with the words 'Pinkie Pie' in its name, you may pay {1}{R}{R} rather than pay Whatever It Is Pinkie Pie Does' mana cost. Choose a card in any hand, library, graveyard or in exile, then play it without paying its mana cost. (Face-down cards and hand cards aren’t revealed until you cast them.) At the beginning of your next end step, absolutely exile it from this freaking match forever.

card.name: Hayseed Turniptruck
card.text: Flash When Hayseed Turniptruck enters the battlefield, counter all other activated and/or triggered abilities.

card.name: Skyra
card.text: Flying When Skyra enters the battlefield, any number of target Unicorn Pony creatures become a copy of Skyra until end of turn. T: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target Pegasus Pony creature.

card.name: Quarray Eel
card.text: Flash, first strike Quarray Eel has hexproof during your opponents' turns. Quarray Eel attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Fancypants And Consort
card.text: Vigilance, haste Glamor (Whenever this creature attacks, you may tap target creature with equal or lower power. Whenever this creature blocks, you may have target creature with equal or lower toughness not untap during its controller's next untap step.)

card.name: Photo Finish
card.text: {T}: Another target creature gains glamor until end of turn. (Whenever a glamorous creature attacks, you may tap target creature with equal or lower power. Whenever a glamorous creature blocks, you may have target creature with equal or lower toughness not untap during its controller’s next untap step.)

card.name: Sapphire Shores
card.text: Glamor (Whenever this creature attacks, you may tap target creature with equal or lower power. Whenever this creature blocks, you may have target creature with equal or lower toughness not untap during its controller's next untap step.) As long as Sapphire Shores is equipped, she has glamor. (More glamor impresses more creatures.)

card.name: The Mayor Of Ponyville
card.text: {2}{W}: Tap target creature. {2}{B}: Target creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Diamond Tiara And Silver Spoon
card.text: {3}{U}: Target opponent returns a Foal he or she controls to its owner's hand. If he or she can't, return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand instead. {3}{B}: Target opponent discards a card. He or she loses 2 life unless that card is a Foal. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: The Flim Flam Brothers
card.text: {4}{B}: Each player sacrifices a land. Put a colorless snack token onto the battlefield for each land sacrificed this way. {4}{R}, Sacrifice four snacks: Gain control of target land.

card.name: Snips And Snails
card.text: {3}{R}: All creatures attack this turn if able. {3}{G}: All creatures block this turn if able.

card.name: Mr. And Mrs. Cake
card.text: {2}{G}, Sacrifice a nontoken snack: Put three colorless snack tokens onto the battlefield. {2}{W}, Sacrifice two snacks: Search your library for a snack card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: The Oranges
card.text: {2}{W}: Gain control of target creature token. (This effect lasts indefinitely) {2}{B}: Creatures you control with power less than The Oranges' power gain wither until end of turn.

card.name: Mr. Greenhooves
card.text: {2}{B}: Destroy target snack. {2}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Critter creature.

card.name: Parasprite Infestation
card.text: Whenever a noncreature permanent is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {B/G}. If you do, put a black and green 1/1 Parasprite Critter creature token with flying onto the battlefield. {1}{B}{G}: Each player sacrifices a snack. If a player can't, that player sacrifices a permanent instead.

card.name: Zecora
card.text: {1}{G}: Regenerate target creature. {1}{U}: Target creature gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Geared Up For Adventure
card.text: Untap each permanent you and your teammates control that is enchanted, equipped, or fortified during each opponent's untap step.

card.name: Idea!
card.text: Rarity Feat – If you control a creature with the word 'Rarity' in its name, you may pay {1}{W}{R} rather than pay Idea!'s mana cost. Draw a card for each tapped creature target player controls.

card.name: Spa Sisters
card.text: {1}{U}: Move a counter from target creature you or a teammate controls onto Spa Sisters {1}{R}: Move a counter from Spa Sisters onto target creature.

card.name: Jet Set And Upper Crust
card.text: {1}{R}: Jet Set and Upper Crust deal 1 damage to target creature without glamor. {1}{W}: Target creature loses glamor until end of turn. Jet Set and Upper Crust gain glamor until end of turn.

card.name: Pony // Pokey
card.text: Target player puts a 1/1 colorless Pony Foal creature token onto the battlefield. --- Destroy target artifact, then distribute an amount of -1/-1 counters equal to that artifact’s converted mana cost among any number of target Foals.

card.name: My Little Pony // Shared Its Magic With Me
card.text: Target creature becomes a 1/1 Pony and you gain control of that creature until the end of your next turn. --- Gain control of all artifacts and non-Aura enchantments target player controls until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Evil // Enchantress
card.text: Choose a color. Each player sacrifices a creature of that color at random. --- Choose a color. Each player sacrifices an enchantment of that color. Draw a card for each enchantment sacrificed this way.

card.name: At The Gala! // At The Gala...
card.text: At the Gala! can't be countered. Spells and abilities can't be countered this turn. Add three mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool. --- Counter all other spells. Players can't cast spells this turn. Nonland abilities can't be activated this turn.

card.name: Where The Grass Is // What's For Dinner
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, shuffle your library the put it on top of your library. If an opponent controls more snacks than you, draw a card. --- Exile the top two cards of your library, then put one of those cards into your hand unless you sacrifice a snack. If you do, repeat the process.

card.name: Braeburn
card.text: Whenever Braeburn becomes tapped, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Landfall – Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, all creatures able to block Braeburn do so.

card.name: Fowl Cockatrice
card.text: Bird offering (You may cast this card any time you could cast an instant by sacrificing a Bird and paying the difference in mana costs between this and the sacrificed Bird. Mana cost includes color.) Deathtouch, reach

card.name: Scheduled Storm
card.text: Prevent all damage Scheduled Storm would deal to tapped Pegasus Ponies you and your teammates control. Scheduled Storm deals X damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Welcome Party
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may move a counter from any number of creatures you control to that creature.

card.name: Apple Barrage
card.text: Applejack Feat – If you control a creature with the word 'Applejack' in its name, you may pay {1}{G}{W} rather than pay Apple Barrage's mana cost. Put three colorless snacks onto the battlefield. Apple Barrage deals 1 damage for each snack you control divided as you choose among up to X target creatures, where X is the number of Earth Ponies you control.

card.name: Panic-Prone Party Ponies
card.text: Panic-Prone Party Ponies can't block. Panic-Prone Party Ponies has double strike as long as it has a -1/-1 counter on it. Persist

card.name: Pipsqueak
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Pipsqueak if a -1/-1 counter was placed on a creature last turn.

card.name: Twiliportation
card.text: Twilight Sparkle Feat – If you control a creature with the words 'Twilight Sparkle' in its name, you may pay {1}{W}{U} rather than pay Twiliportation's mana cost. You may exile any number of blocked creatures you control and own, then return them to the battlefield tapped and attacking. (They can't be blocked again normally.)

card.name: DJ Pon3
card.text: {T}: Tap target creature. DJ Pon3 deals 1 damage to that creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Facehoof
card.text: Whenever you cast Facehoof or another bronze-bordered or silver-bordered spell, you may have target creature you control deal damage equal to its power to itself and another target creature or player.

You may cast Pony spells as though they had flash. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may return another target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand if the amount of colors it has is less than the amount of colors of that creature.

card.text: Enchant Creature You control enchanted creature as long as it has a -1/-1 counter on it.

card.text: Tap target permanent. If it’s double- faced, transform it. Then, if it’s a Pony creature, all creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is equal to that Pony’s power.

card.text: Whenever another creature dies put a +1/+1 counter on Haunted Oak. {B}{B},{T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target Pony creature.

card.text: Foal creatures you and your teammates control get +1/+1 for each +1/+1 counter on Granny Smith.

card.name: Octavia

card.text: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.) Move a counter from target creature onto another target creature.

card.name: Neighsay
card.text: Counter target activated or triggered ability. If a Pony's ability is countered this way, draw a card.

card.name: Rainbow Crash
card.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owners hand if the amount of colours it has is less than the amount of colours among permanents you control.

card.name: Surprise!
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the number of creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them.

card.name: Too Much Pie
card.text: When Too Much Pie enters the battlefield, put two colorless snack tokens onto the battlefield. {3}, Sacrifice a snack: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Colgate
card.text: When Colgate enters the battlefield, remove up to three counters from target permanent.

card.name: Doctor Hooves
card.text: When Doctor Hooves enters the battlefield, proliferate. (You may choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.) Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

card.name: Executive Veto
card.text: Counter target Pony spell.

card.name: Baked Bads
card.text: When Baked Bads enters the battlefield, put two colorless snack tokens onto the battlefield. {1}, Sacrifice a snack: Tap target creature.

card.name: Banish From Equestria
card.text: Put target creature or enchantment into its owner’s library second from the top.

card.name: Birthday Pony
card.text: Lifelink When Birthday Pony enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Cake, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Canterlot Cavelier
card.text: Glamor (Whenever this creature attacks, you may tap target creature with equal or lower power. Whenever this creature blocks, you may have target creature with equal or lower toughness not untap during its controller's next untap step)

card.name: Canterlot Porter
card.text: When Canterlot Porter enters the battlefield, you may attach any number of target Equipments you control to it.

card.name: Common Travails
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each tapped creature you control.

card.name: Cooped Chickens
card.text: When Cooped Chickens leaves the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each counter on it.

card.name: Fight For Your Friendship
card.text: Remove all -1/-1 counters from target creature, then put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Gossamer Wings
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying and glamor (Whenever this creature attacks, you may tap target creature with equal or lower power. Whenever this creature blocks, you may have target creature with equal or lower toughness not untap during its controller's next untap step)

card.name: Grumpy Goat
card.text: Grumpy Goat has first strike and vigilance as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Indignant Waiter
card.text: {W}: Search your library for a snack card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle Indignant Waiter into your library.

card.name: Shattered Dreams
card.text: Destroy all enchantments that share a color with target creature.

card.name: Sisterhooves Siblings
card.text: When Sisterhooves Siblings enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 colorless Pony Foal creature token onto the battlefield. {T}: Target Foal creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Carrot Top
card.text: When Carrot Top enters the battlefield, target player puts a colorless snack token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Love and Tolerate
card.text: All creatures target player controls gain protection from non-Ponies until end of turn.

card.name: Nurse Redheart
card.text: Flash When Nurse Redheart enters the battlefield, you may remove a -1/-1 counter from any number of target creatures.

card.name: A Rock
card.text: A Rock is indestructible (Effects that say 'destroy' don't destroy it.) When a legendary pony enters the battlefield under your control, you may sacrifice A Rock. If you do, add one mana of any color to your mana pool and draw a card. (Put A Rock into your graveyard when you sacrifice it.)

card.name: Adoring Fans
card.text: Adoring Fans’ power and toughness are each equal to the number of Fans you control. Whenever a player casts a Fan spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target legendary creature.

card.name: Amicable Letter
card.text: {2/G}{2/U}{T}: Draw a card. At the beginning of your end step, target opponent gains control of Amicable Letter.

card.name: Cake
card.text: When Cake enters or leaves the battlefield, put a colorless snack token onto the battlefield and gain 2 life.

card.name: Clony
card.text: When Clony enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card with the same name as a nonlegendary Pony creature on the battlefield, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Cloudsdale Worker
card.text: Flying When you cast Cloudsdale Worker, add {U}, {R}, or {G} to your mana pool. Whenever a player casts a Pegasus Spell, add {U}, {R}, or {G} to your mana pool.

card.text: Champion a Pony (When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another permanent you control that is a Pony.
